title: Prestigious Ballarat Grammar banned from accepting new boarders amid child safety reports
summary: A school board has issued an apology after a regulator imposed six interim conditions on its operations. This decision comes as part of an ongoing review of the board's practices and policies. The board is working to address the concerns raised by the regulator in order to improve its standards.

title: Nationals ‘proud’ to formally scrap net zero target after party room meeting
summary: David Littleproud has revealed that he communicated the potential policy position of his party to Sussan Ley several days earlier. This indicates ongoing discussions within the party regarding their stance on certain issues. The announcement highlights the dynamics of communication among party members.
